"フォトンドリンクＥＸへの道":
"I've finally discovered it! The perfect
drink! But it seems I lack the proper
ingredients to yield the results I want.

This is truly going to be an amazing
drink, would you mind helping me out by
gathering the required ingredients?

※Cae de Nv.21+ Kartagots and
Signo Guns, respectively."
